{{ anime.title }}

{{ anime.synopsis }}

No. of episodes: {{ anime.episodes }}
{{ anime.rating }}
import { Component, OnInit } from "@angular/core"; import { Store } from "@ngrx/store"; import { Observable } from "rxjs"; import { Anime } from "./anime.state"; @Component({ selector: "app-anime", templateUrl: "./anime.component.html", }) export class AnimePageComponent implements OnInit { anime$: Observable = this.store.select((state) => state.anime); constructor(private store: Store<{ anime: Anime[] }>) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.store.dispatch({ type: "[Anime Page] Load Anime" }); } onPrev() { this.store.dispatch( loadList({ select: this.fname, page: this.pr, total: 20 }) ); } onNext() { this.store.dispatch( loadList({ select: this.fname, page: this.nx, total: 20 }) ); } }
